title: But Now I See
description: They were continually at cross purposes—“She understood one thing with every bone in her body: he could do anything, get anything done; it was terrifying how much competence, influence, and power he had.”He realized that “Sweet little Ali had the jagged talons of a vulture, capable of ripping out a man’s heart in one fell swoop… and at this point in time, he was that man; it was his heart.”But Now I See, the concluding sequel to My Heart to Fear, by Lulu Astor.
author: Lulu Astor
